attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The world is faced with imminent oil supply reduction. World reserves near exhustion and are under the ground of people who hate us. WAKE UP NOW. The Government must at once initiate the re-opening of British coal mines and accelerate the construction of nuclear power plants and explain the reason why to the people

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
